questions.question: 量子芯片相比真空管的主要优势是什么？ (What is the main advantage of quantum chips compared to vacuum tubes?)
options: A. 体积更大 (A. Larger size)
B. 计算更快 (B. Faster computation)
C. 能耗更高 (C. Higher energy consumption)
D. 兼容性差 (D. Poor compatibility)

questions.question: 在乡村OS升级中，隐私泄露的风险如何体现？ (How does the risk of privacy leakage manifest in rural OS upgrades?)
options: A. 数据被城市公司垄断 (A. Data monopolized by urban companies)
B. 网速变快 (B. Faster internet speed)
C. 芯片演变无关 (C. Unrelated to chip evolution)
D. 公平性提升 (D. Increased fairness)

questions.question: 芯片从真空管到量子的演变对乡村发展的影响是什么？ (What is the impact of chip evolution from vacuum tubes to quantum on rural development?)
options: A. 加剧城乡鸿沟 (A. Widens urban-rural divide)
B. 减少技术依赖 (B. Reduces technology dependence)
C. 提升可持续性 (C. Enhances sustainability)
D. 忽略设计原则 (D. Ignores design principles)

questions.question: OS安装中的公平性原则指的是什么？ (What does the fairness principle in OS installation refer to?)
options: A. 确保城乡数据平等 (A. Ensuring equal data access in urban and rural areas)
B. 增加安装复杂度 (B. Increasing installation complexity)
C. 忽略隐私风险 (C. Ignoring privacy risks)
D. 仅适用于量子芯片 (D. Only applicable to quantum chips)

questions.question: 量子OS未来如何改变乡村农业？ (How will quantum OS change rural agriculture in the future?)
options: A. 通过AI优化作物管理，但需注意伦理偏见 (A. Optimize crop management via AI, but beware of ethical biases)
B. 使农业回归手工 (B. Return agriculture to manual labor)
C. 增加数据泄露 (C. Increase data leaks)
D. 无任何影响 (D. No impact at all)
